title: Pakistan postpones Afghan Peace Conference until after Eid
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 16 (APP): The Afghan Peace Conference scheduled to be held in Islamabad from 17-19 July 2021 has been postponed, the Foreign Office confirmed on Friday.
The Foreign Office said the conference had been postponed until after Eid Al Azha.
“The new dates of the conference will be announced later,” the FO said.
